karlocool - I also wonder what the QT means.
ChucksterP - I never burn directly with DVDFab and have no idea why yours failed. You can of course burn it later with ImgBurn or another burn utility.

What QT Means:
DVDFab 8.0.9.0 Qt Updated!
New: Rewritten user interface with Qt.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Qt_(framework)
